DISTANCE, LEAD_TIME, CASE COURSE_LEVEL WHEN "1" THEN "초급" WHEN "2" THEN "중급" WHEN "3" THEN "고급" END AS COURSE_LEVEL,

OR RELATE_SUBWAY LIKE concat('%', #{RELATE_SUBWAY}, '%')
OR TRAFFIC_INFO LIKE concat('%', #{TRAFFIC_INFO}, '%')
OR CONTENT LIKE concat('%', #{CONTENT}, '%')
OR COURSE_NAME LIKE concat('%', #{COURSE_NAME}, '%')
OR REG_DATE LIKE concat('%', #{REG_DATE}, '%')
